column2:
"Man, that was...
I really felt somethin' stirrin' inside me a couple of times there."
"I bet if I keep watchin' you, I'll be a killer just like you in no time flat."
"Hey, what am I doin'? There's no time to stand around here with my mouth hangin' open."
"I gotta get out there and train while the image of ya goin' to work is still fresh in my mind!"
